title: My account has a racist name... Can i get a name change?
body:
I recently aquired this account from a buddy of mine, and the name is crazy racist and im worried ill be penalized for it..
I appologize for this inconvenience..

I will change it to something fun and not racist, this name is terrible!!

thanks for your time :)

replies.body: Yeeeeaaaaa that name should probably go. Small side-note, account sharing is widely frowned upon by Riot. Even though this account looks pretty fresh and new, please remember to keep your info safe and not to share accounts. Account sharing is how most accounts get stolen, and it's likely the account may not be recoverable if consistently shared.

yes it is my account now, no sharing.

how can i change my name?
honestly the account is low enough level, it might be better to just start a new one, it would be faster than grinding the essence required for a name change
The in-game store has a way to change your name, its 13,900 BE or 1300 Rp. It is a small circle containing a human with a gear behind it on the top right.
